00021 GrAnim::GrAnim( const tstring& name, float blendWeight, float speed )
00022 : _player( 0 )
00023 , _blendWeight( blendWeight )
00024 , _speed( speed )
00025 , _parent( 0 )
00026 , _name( name )
00027 {

00031 //----------------------------------------------------------
00032 GrAnim::~GrAnim()
00033 {
00035         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00036                 delete[] _children[ i ];
00037 }

00044 //----------------------------------------------------------
00045 GrAnim*
00046 GrAnim::Clone() const
00047 {
00049         GrAnim* anim = new GrAnim( _name, _blendWeight, _speed );
00050         CloneChildren( anim );
00051 
00052         return anim;
00053 }

00055 //----------------------------------------------------------
00056 void
00057 GrAnim::SetPlayer( GrAnimPlayer* player )
00058 {
00060         if ( player != _player )
00061         {
00062                 OnPlayerChange( player );
00063                 _player = player;
00064 
00066                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00067                         _children[ i ]->SetPlayer( player );
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 //----------------------------------------------------------
00072 void
00073 GrAnim::AddChild( GrAnim* child )
00074 {
00076         _children.Push( child );
00077 
00079         if ( child->_parent )
00080                 child->_parent->RemoveChild( child );
00081         child->_parent = this;
00082 
00084         child->SetPlayer( _player );
00085 }
00086 
00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 unsigned int
00089 GrAnim::GetChildCount() const
00090 {
00091         return _children.GetElemCount();
00092 }
00093 
00094 //----------------------------------------------------------
00095 GrAnim*
00096 GrAnim::GetChild( unsigned int idx )
00097 {
00098         B_ASSERT( idx < _children.GetElemCount() );
00099         return _children[ idx ];
00100 }

00102 //----------------------------------------------------------
00103 void
00104 GrAnim::RemoveChild( GrAnim* child )
00105 {
00106         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00107         {
00108                 if ( _children[ i ] == child )
00109                         _children.Erase( i );
00110         }
00111 }

00113 //----------------------------------------------------------
00114 void
00115 GrAnim::SeekTo( float time )
00116 {
00117         OnSeekTo( time );
00118 
00120         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00121                 _children[ i ]->OnSeekTo( time );
00122 }

00124 //----------------------------------------------------------
00125 float
00126 GrAnim::GetDuration()
00127 {
00128         if ( _speed < 0.001f )
00129                 return 0.0f;
00130 
00131         float invSpeed = 1.0f / _speed;
00132 
00135         float duration = OnGetDuration();
00136 
00138         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00139                 duration = Max( duration, invSpeed * _children[ i ]->GetDuration() );
00140 
00142         return duration;
00143 }
00144 
00145 //----------------------------------------------------------
00146 void
00147 GrAnim::ApplyPose( float timeAdvance, float parentBlendWeight )
00148 {
00149         B_ASSERT( _player != 0 );
00150 
00152         if ( _blendWeight < 0.001f )
00153                 return;
00154 
00156         float actualTimeAdvance = _speed * timeAdvance;
00157         float actualBlendWeight = parentBlendWeight * _blendWeight;
00158         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00159                 _children[ i ]->ApplyPose( actualTimeAdvance, actualBlendWeight );
00160 
00162         OnApplyPose( actualTimeAdvance, actualBlendWeight );
00163 }
00164

00170 //----------------------------------------------------------
00171 void
00172 GrAnim::CloneChildren( GrAnim* parent ) const
00173 {
00174         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00175                 parent->AddChild( _children[ i ]->Clone() );
00176 }
